amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funding for an Ultra Low Profile EARS Gunshot Localization System.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 432 printed in Part B of House Report 111-233 to prohibit funding for an Ultra Low Profile EARS Gunshot Localization System.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 82 - 341, 11 Present (Roll no. 667).
